rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Spacious and comfortable accommodation perfect for families. Features multiple beds, a private balcony, and stunning garden views.

rooms.name: Double Room
rooms.description: Intimate and luxurious room designed for couples. Enjoy a romantic ambiance with modern amenities and a private garden view.

rooms.name: Villa
rooms.description: Exclusive luxury villa offering complete privacy and comfort. Perfect for groups or families seeking a premium experience with spacious living areas, multiple bedrooms, and stunning panoramic views.
